Workflow.Name: CLEANUP - Admin | Sync Template v3 (PVA Usage)
Workflow.Description: This flow rolls up Power Virtual Agents (bot) information on a monthly basis. This information is retrieved from underlying Dataverse tables and requires the user running the flow to have system administrator privileges in the environment. Turning on this flow is optional, and we recommend that you do so only if you're using Power Virtual Agents in your tenant and are interested in getting a tenant-wide overview.

LocalizedName.description: CLEANUP - Admin | Sync Template v3 (PVA Usage)

Turning on this flow is optional, and we recommend that you do so only if you're using Power Virtual Agents in your tenant and are interested in getting a tenant-wide overview.
